content:
alexcrichton labeled issue #5119:

Currently the Component structure in Wasmtime does not have a serialize or deserialize method along the lines of the Module type. This should be implemented to support AOT compilation for components. This issue is intended to track the progress of that.

alexcrichton opened issue #5119:

Currently the Component structure in Wasmtime does not have a serialize or deserialize method along the lines of the Module type. This should be implemented to support AOT compilation for components. This issue is intended to track the progress of that.

alexcrichton closed issue #5119:

Currently the Component structure in Wasmtime does not have a serialize or deserialize method along the lines of the Module type. This should be implemented to support AOT compilation for components. This issue is intended to track the progress of that.
